[url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url]Fires Hurt
A Skyrim mod by abot

Description:
Standing over normal fires burn player, magic pillars restore player magic and damage health.

Configuration from game console:
global Variable ab01fhOff +1 = disable magic fire, +2 = disable steam, +4 = disable fire, +1024 = reset
set ab01fhOff to 0 (default) = magic pillar effect on, steam effect on, fires effect on

set ab01fhOff to 1 to disable magic fire
set ab01fhOff to 2 to disable steam
set ab01fhOff to 4 to disable fire
set ab01fhOff to 3 to disable magic fire, steam
set ab01fhOff to 5 to disable magic fire, fire
set ab01fhOff to 7 to disable magic fire, steam, fire
set ab01fhOff to 6 to disable steam, fire
set ab01fhOff to 1024 to reset mod whenever you update this mod or any listed compatible mod.

set ab01fhDamage to 0 = standard small scenic damage
set ab01fhDamage to 1 = higher damage


Requirements:
Tested working with Skyrim version 1.8, may work with some previous version but no guarantees.


Usage:
It is suggested to use the
set ab01fhOff to 1024
console command to reset whenever you update this mod or any listed compatible mod.


Release history:

v 1.09
- added damage from steam sources
- now working with fireplaces added by CampingKitNorthernRanger.esp, CampingKitNorthernRanger - Without Amberwood.esp, Chesko_Frostfall.esp, dynamic fires.esp

v 1.08
- fixed a detection range bug introduced in version 1.07 

v 1.07
- should work better with cooking pots

v 1.06
- added setting for (hopefully) updating compatible mods without clean uninstalling/reinstalling this mod:
 from the game console, type:
set ab01fhOff to 3
- added setting for 8x damage 
 from the game console, type:
set ab01fhDamage to 1
(set ab01fhDamage to 0 to reset to standard small scenic damage)


v 1.05
- updated for compatibility with Frostfall 2

v 1.04
- fixed burning range of small cooking fires

v 1.03
- changed fire sound

v 1.02
- tweaked compatibility code with extra mods

v 1.01
- now working with fireplaces added by CampingKitNorthernRanger.esp, Chesko_Frostfall.esp, dynamic fires.esp
- better effect range of scaled fires
- increased quest priority

v 1.00
initial release

Uninstall:
Unload abotFiresHurt.esp and remove Data\\Scripts\\ab01fhQuest.pex (and optionally Data\\Scripts\\Source\\ab01fhQuest.psc).

Debugging:
set ab01fhDebug to 10, 11, 12 for some debug info
